about_greeting1: This application will help you design your project and learn CSS. You can find CSS-properties generator on page
about_greeting3: helps you to design a card as per the provided option. On the
about_greeting4: page you can convert RGB and HEX color codes for use in web design. Practice and improve recall of CSS flexbox properties and values in Flex Sloths game on page
about_developer1_description: CSS-generator page, Hex & RGB Converter page, language switching, routing and architecture

about_more: More info about features and working process you can find in our
home_welcome: It is easy to start learning CSS with
home_welcome2: This application will help you to learn CSS properties and designing your project
home_div_css_generator: Useful CSS-generator to help generate CSS for elements in your page. You can make a background for your website; try different border, border-radius and the box-shadow CSS property adds a shadow to the components it affects; perform your text and image; position your elements
home_div_card_generator: Create your own CSS card emplate with Card Generator! You can choose Styles, Card Content, Background and Text Shadow, and also pick any image you want
home_div_hexrgb: Convert HEX color codes to RGB HTML format for use in web design and CSS. Also converts HEX to RGBA
home_div_game: Flexbox Sloths - a game for learning CSS flexbox. The goal of the game is to help the sloths get to their deadlines by writing CSS code. See if you can beat all the levels!
home_div_about: Learn more about application and our team
